item.title: Report E-2025040455
item.description:
Report E-2025040455

Identified by scraper @ 2025-05-24T01:00:23+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2025-03-20
  • City: CHASKA
  • State: MN
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: AIRGAS SPECIALTY PRODUCTS, INC.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 1
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: Our driver hooked up his hose to begin the offloading of anhydrous ammonia into a refrigeration system. Once the hose was hooked up, the driver started pumping the liquid ammonia. After starting the pump, the driver noticed a small leak at the hose connection. The driver then attempted to fix the leak with out shutting the pump off and putting on his PPE. While tightening the connection he moved the nozzle on the hose causing an aerosol of ammonia that traveled past his face which caused eye irritation due to not having goggles on. The duration of the leak was less than one minute and the release was fixed by getting the hose nozzle tightened at the connection.
